ygData.subject: Re: Enchant Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Neriak (3rd gate,library) is the only known location for any of the enchant metal spells. ... From: Charles Adams [mailto:sirkal@dubuque.net] Sent: Thursday,
ygData.messageBody:
Neriak (3rd gate,library) is the only known location for any of the
enchant metal spells.

-----Original Message-----
From: Charles Adams [mailto:sirkal@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 4:09 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Enchant Spells


From: Charles Adams <sirkal@...>

Hi, I am new to the list.

Can anyone please tell me the locations of the enchant metal spells. I
have
been told Neriak, but I can't believe that that is the only location.
Thanks for any help.
Xezol - Lvl 10 Gnome Mag on E'Ci

Visit My Zone Map Page:
http://www.dubuque.net/~sirkal/newpage11.htm
